name: Phoenix 12x16 Balcony Deck Plan – Resort-Style Elevated Balcony with Pergola
open_features: (2) 18×18×12 in square concrete footings supporting 6×6 posts
Ledger (deck): (2) 2×12 SP No.2 to existing wall
Pergola rafters: 2×8 SP No.2 @ 16 in O.C.; battens 4×2 @ 16 in O.C.
Railing: 4×4 posts with 2×4 top/bottom rails; 2×2 balusters @ 6 in O.C. (≤4 in gap), 42 in height
Heights: Bottom of balcony ~10′-0″ above grade; top of balcony ~13′-6″
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z post bases, HUC410 & LUS210 hangers, LUS28 (rafters), LPC4Z caps, EPC66 angles, A34 clips
Notes: Attachments to existing wall per details; temporary bracing and jobsite safety required; preliminary use only
safety_note: Balcony and pergola connections to the existing structure must be engineered for the specific site and substrate. Obtain permits and verify code compliance with licensed professionals.
